sentences.english: This paper presents a new method for the comprehensive utilization of copper- containing magnesite bricks.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種綜合利用含銅鎂磚的新方法。

sentences.english: This is a hybrid magnesia low chromite brick made from dead burned magnesia.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種由重燒鎂砂製成的混合型低鉻鎂磚。
